Sohu, Chinese web portal and online media company

sentences.english: I think Sohu is brave to do this.
sentences.chinese: 我认为搜狐在这点上很勇敢。

sentences.english: I am hidden in your heart O Flower.
sentences.chinese: 优酷藏在搜狐视频心里呢，花呀。

sentences.english: Sohu also develops its own social games for this platform.
sentences.chinese: 另外，搜狐为这个平台开发了自己的社交游戏。

sentences.english: I'm sorry， I‘ve got the wrong number.
sentences.chinese: 搜狐公司？对不起，我打错了。

sentences.english: Recently, websites such as sohu.com, set up special sections for people to "divulge their salaries".
sentences.chinese: 近日，搜狐等网站设立了一些所谓的“晒工资”专区。

sentences.english: Contributed to the Sohu achievement biggest was still the brand advertizing and the online game.
sentences.chinese: 对搜狐业绩贡献最大的仍是品牌广告和在线游戏。

sentences.english: You can see the same dynamic at work at Sohu, the owner of China's fourth-most-visited website.
sentences.chinese: 中国访问量第四大的网站搜狐也有这样的纠结。

sentences.english: What differ with Sohu nevertheless is, the way that the net that Netease walks out of swims is realer.
sentences.chinese: 不过与搜狐不同的是，网易走出的网游之路更纯粹。

sentences.english: I feel hidden in your heart; O Flower.
sentences.chinese: 优酷藏在搜狐视频心里呢，花呀。

sentences.english: Recently, websites such as sohu.com, set up special sections for people to " divulge their salaries ".
sentences.chinese: 近日，搜狐等网站设立了一些所谓的“晒工资”专区。

sentences.english: Youku and Ku6 were both founded by former Sohu managers.
sentences.chinese: 优酷和酷六都是由前搜狐高管创立的。

sentences.english: I’m sorry, I’ve got the wrong number.
sentences.chinese: 搜狐公司？对不起，我打错了。

sentences.english: I find a very interesting series TV program in tv. sohu. com.
sentences.chinese: 我在搜狐视频栏目找到一系列有趣的节目。

sentences.english: A special chapter of OWC will be developed and published on the website of SOHU.
sentences.chinese: “橙色风”专题届时将在搜狐网上隆重发布。

sentences.english: There, analysts expect revenue to rise 21% this year.
sentences.chinese: 分析师预计搜狐今年收入将增长21%。

sentences.english: It has already attracted more visitors than Sohu.
sentences.chinese: 现在，优酷吸引的访客已超过搜狐。
